Description: Responsibilities:·       Manage staff and delegate responsibility as needed;·       Maintain excellent customer service standards;·       Minimize company losses and damage claims while controlling costs;·       Identify and resolve customer complaints;·       Hire and ensure all employees and managers are trained according to policies;·       Maintain constant training of personnel on systems and procedures;·       Ensure that a high level of cleanliness is always maintained in the tunnel, customer areas, vacuum lot, and backroom;·       Achieve profit goals for the location;·       Maintain efficient personnel scheduling;·       Maintain vendor relations and build new client relations;·       Oversee daily business operations;·       Complete all administrative tasks in an organized, timely manner;·       Hold meetings to conform with company standards;·       Maintain safe environment and work experience;·       Assess performance and skill of all employees and conduct performance reviews.Skills
Skills: ·       Positive attitude and ethics which support our values and culture;
·       Excellent communication skills to connect effectively with customers and co-workers;
·       Has at least 2+ years in Car Wash business;
·       Strong time-management skills; ability to multi-task, prioritize, and organize;
With at least 2 Years experience and willing to relocate from Doha To Saudi ---
Doha: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)
